results.description: Michael van Gerwen wins the World Series of Darts title for the fourth time, beating Danny Noppert in the final in Amsterdam.
results.shortTitle: Van Gerwen cruises to World Series win
results.title: Michael van Gerwen wins World Series of Darts in Amsterdam

results.description: Rob Cross continues an impressive 2019 with victory at the European Championship in Gottingen, Germany.
results.title: Rob Cross wins European Championship in Gottingen

results.description: Watch as world number one Michael van Gerwen comes from 10-7 down against Peter Wright to win his first Champions League of Darts title.
results.shortTitle: Van Gerwen wins first Champions League of Darts title
results.title: Champions League of Darts: Van Gerwen wins four straight legs to clinch title

results.description: Michael van Gerwen wins four straight legs to beat Peter Wright 11-10 and claim his first Champions League of Darts title.
results.shortTitle: Van Gerwen hits back to win Champions League
results.title: Champions League of Darts: Michael van Gerwen beats Peter Wright in final

results.description: Watch as James Wade wins a tense match 10-9 against defending champion Gary Anderson, who is knocked out of the 2019 Champions League of Darts on the opening day.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Wade knocks out defending champion Anderson
results.title: Champions League of Darts: James Wade knocks out defending champion Gary Anderson

results.description: Defending champion Gary Anderson is out of the 2019 Champions League of Darts after losing his first two group games.
results.shortTitle: Anderson knocked out of Champions League
results.title: Champions League of Darts: Defending champion Gary Anderson out of competition

results.description: Gary Anderson starts the defence of his Champions League title hoping to rediscover his best form after an injury-hit year.
results.shortTitle: Anderson set for Champions League defence
results.title: Champions League of Darts: Gary Anderson seeks return to top form as defending champion

results.description: With the 2019 Champions League of Darts set to be broadcast across the BBC this weekend, try our darts nicknames quiz.
results.shortTitle: How well do you know your darts nicknames?
results.title: Champions League of Darts: How well do you know your darts nicknames?

results.description: Michael van Gerwen beat Peter Wright in a dramatic Champions League of Darts final at the Morningside Arena in Leicester - relive the action.
results.title: PDC Champions League of Darts final - as it happened

results.description: The world's best eight players compete for a £250,000 prize at the Morningside Arena in Leicester - watch BBC coverage of the group stages and follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Watch: PDC Champions League of Darts - day one
results.title: Watch: PDC Champions League of Darts latest - day one

thumbnail.altText: 2018 PDC Champions League of Darts winner Gary Anderson

results.description: World number one Michael van Gerwen beats England's Dave Chisnall to win the World Grand Prix title for the fifth time.
results.shortTitle: Van Gerwen wins fifth World Grand Prix
results.title: Michael van Gerwen wins World Grand Prix for fifth time

results.description: Champion Gerwyn Price's £20,000 fine for his behaviour at the Grand Slam of Darts is halved but his appeal over a disrepute verdict is rejected.
results.shortTitle: Price fine for Anderson antics halved
results.title: Gerwyn Price's fine over Gary Anderson match halved but disrepute verdict upheld

thumbnail.altText: Gerwyn Price celebrates against Nathan Aspinall

results.description: The British Darts Organisation is moving its World Championships to London in 2020, after 34 years at Lakeside.
results.shortTitle: BDO World Championships to leave Lakeside
results.title: BDO World Championships to leave Lakeside venue in 2020

results.description: Rob Cross wins the PDC World Matchplay darts title for the first time with an 18-13 victory over Michael Smith.
results.title: PDC World Matchplay: Rob Cross wins title with 18-13 win over Michael Smith

results.description: Glen Durrant's bid to win the PDC World Matchplay continues as he beats James Wade to reach the semi-finals.
results.shortTitle: Durrant's World Matchplay bid goes on
results.title: PDC World Matchplay: Glen Durrant beats James Wade to reach semi-finals

results.description: Glen Durrant says he will never forget his dramatic World Matchplay second round win over Michael van Gerwen.
results.shortTitle: Durrant elated after win over van Gerwen
results.title: PDC World Matchplay: Glen Durrant defeats Michael van Gerwen in Blackpool

results.description: Boxing ring girl Ellisha-Jade defends her work after other sports dropped promotional models.
results.shortTitle: 'It's not objectifying in a harmful way'
results.title: Boxing ring girl Ellisha-Jade: 'Objectifying not harmful'

results.description: World champion Michael van Gerwen beats Rob Cross at London's O2 Arena to win his fifth Premier League title.
results.shortTitle: Van Gerwen wins fifth Premier League
results.title: Premier League Darts: Michael van Gerwen beats Rob Cross to win fifth title

results.description: How a darts player went from having £2,000 in the bank to winning £200,000 in prize money.
results.title: From accountant to darts champion

results.description: World number one Michael van Gerwen wins in Leeds to finish top of the Premier League group-phase table.
results.shortTitle: Van Gerwen tops Premier League table
results.title: Premier League Darts: Michael van Gerwen tops Premier League table for seventh straight year
